alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 2:53PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 330 PM EST... At 253 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amelia City, or near Fernandina Beach, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Talbot Island, Oceanway and Amelia City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
